OrgName.entry: PSYCHOLOGICAL HEALTH SHEFFIELD - SHEFFIELD CARE TRUST

Desc.entry: Provides psychological assessment, therapy, training and supervision, consultancy in clinical and organisational psychology and counselling. Services are offered to people with physical and mental health problems and disabilities across their lifespan. Over 190 clinical and organisational psychologists, counsellors, psychotherapists and CBT therapists work within health and social services across Sheffield and Rotherham. Access to this service is through the specialist services or via a GP.

DisabledAccess.entry: Some parts of the building have wheelchair access and disabled toilet, please contact for details
